description: A complete HTML frontend for a Database Viewer application, including UI layout, styling, and JavaScript logic for interacting with backend APIs to load databases, tables, and display table data dynamically.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the backend API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets the display area.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles display of tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data fetched from the backend into an HTML table with interactive cells.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual table cell content, handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content when clicked, supporting nested objects and long text.
